title: Chefs’ Playground EuroJapanese Cafe/Restaurant
description: Chefs’ Playground is a refreshing All-day dining EuroJapanese cafe/restaurant. We serve interesting Appetizers, very impressionable Pasta, Pizza and Teppan mains as well as Desserts like Creme Brulee, Matcha Cheese Cake, Waffle and Fruit Granola. Barista Coffee/Matcha as well as Coolers adds the finishing touches to a great meal and tea time. Enjoy a great meal and tea time with your family at Chefs' Playground.
Keyword_tag: EuroJapanese cafe, restaurant, appetizers, pasta, pizza, teppan mains, desserts, coffee, matcha, family dining
full_address: 5 Stadium Walk, #01-30 Leisure Park Kallang, Singapore 397693

title: Chef's Playground
blurb: Discover culinary delights at Leisure Park Kallang.
description: Chef's Playground at Leisure Park Kallang offers a unique culinary experience. Explore a variety of dining options and discover new flavors. Perfect for families and food enthusiasts looking for a delightful meal in a vibrant setting. Enjoy a range of cuisines and create memorable dining experiences. From casual eateries to upscale restaurants, there's something for everyone. Indulge in delicious dishes and savor the culinary creations of talented chefs. A perfect destination for a family outing or a special occasion. Experience the joy of food and create lasting memories.
full_address: 5 Stadium Walk, #01-30 Leisure Park Kallang, Singapore 397693

title: Chefs’ Playground
description: Chefs’ Playground is a unique culinary-themed playground designed to ignite children's imaginations and foster a love for food and cooking. The playground features various interactive play zones, including a mock kitchen, a pretend grocery store, and a dining area, allowing children to engage in imaginative role-playing and develop essential life skills. Kids can explore different food groups, learn about healthy eating habits, and create their own culinary masterpieces in a fun and safe environment. The playground also offers cooking classes and workshops for children of all ages, providing hands-on experience in preparing simple and delicious recipes. It is a perfect place for families to spend quality time together, encouraging creativity, teamwork, and a passion for food.
Keyword_tag: Culinary playground, kids activities, cooking classes, family fun, interactive play zones, healthy eating, role-playing, mock kitchen, pretend grocery store, dining area
full_address: 5 Stadium Walk, #01-30 Leisure Park Kallang, Singapore 397693
